DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare antidepressant efficacy , safety , tolerability DVS-SR subject receive daily dos 50 mg 100 mg DVS-SR versus subject receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Desvenlafaxine Sustained-Release ( DVS-SR ) Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis major depressive disorder Must able swallow tablet Must least 18 year age . Clinical diagnosis psychiatric disorder Significant risk suicide Unstable medical condition .
